name: modern-saas-template-aws-react-nodejs
description: This is a generic template designed for creating Software as a Service (SaaS) applications within the Amazon Web Services (AWS) environment. It is built using modern technologies and provides a solid foundation for building a scalable and cost-efficient SaaS application that is mobile responsive and suitable for startups.

scripts.install: cd Frontend && npm i && cd ../Infrastructure && npm i
scripts.synth: cd Frontend && npm  run build && cd ../Infrastructure && cdk synth
scripts.deploy: cd Frontend && npm  run build && cd ../Infrastructure && cdk deploy
